00310 #define GF_NEW(v, stmt) \
00311 { \
00312   try { \
00313     v = new stmt; \
00314   } \
00315   catch (const std::bad_alloc&) { \
00316     throw gemfire::OutOfMemoryException( \
00317         "Out of Memory while executing \""#v" = new "#stmt";\""); \
00318   } \
00319 }
00320 
00322 #define GF_SAFE_DELETE(x) \
00323 { \
00324   delete x; \
00325   x = NULL; \
00326 }
00327 
00329 #define GF_SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(x) \
00330 { \
00331   delete [ ] x; \
00332   x = NULL; \
00333 }
00334 
00335 #endif
